Description: On I-81 at mile marker 116.2 in the County of Montgomery, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south left shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On US-29 in the County of Campbell, in the vicinity of Hawkins Rd; Rt. 888E/W (Campbell County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
